mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.energy AS "energy", a.protein AS "protein", a.fat AS "fat", a.carbohydrate AS "carbohydrate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM a
AND a.name LIKE concat('%',#{food.name},'%')
AND a.type LIKE concat('%',#{food.type},'%')
ORDER BY a.type ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( id, name, type, energy, protein, fat, carbohydrate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{energy}, #{protein}, #{fat}, #{carbohydrate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, energy = #{energy}, protein = #{protein}, fat = #{fat}, carbohydrate = #{carbohydrate} WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
